code: public Exchange aggregate(Exchange oldExchange, Exchange newExchange) {     // lets append the old body to the new body     if (oldExchange == null) {         return newExchange.     }     String body = oldExchange.getIn().getBody(String.class).     if (body != null) {         Message newIn = newExchange.getIn().         String newBody = newIn.getBody(String.class).         if (newBody != null) {             body += " " + newBody.         }         LOG.debug("**** invoked my strategy with result: " + body).         newIn.setBody(body).     }     return newExchange. }
